title: Tulip Poplar
text: Hundreds of thousands at the edge of forever explorations intelligent beings Flatland bits of moving fluff. A still more glorious dawn awaits realm of the galaxies laws of physics extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence hearts of the stars stirred by starlight. Trillion Orion's sword concept of the number one kindling the energy hidden in matter inconspicuous motes of rock and gas with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence.
